classes.name: PluginsUtil
classes.description: Utility methods for plugin configurations troubleshooting.

methods.name: dumpAllPluginsConfigurations
methods.description: Dump configuration for all installed plugins which store their bits in IEndpointService

methods.name: exception
methods.description: This method will throw NPE. Useful for debugging purposes.

methods.name: createTrigger
methods.description: This method will create plugin trigger. Useful for debugging purposes.

methods.name: pushTrigger
methods.description: This method will push plugin trigger notification. Useful for debugging purposes.

methods.name: getPrincipal
methods.description: Get current user token from ICredential service and return its principal field
